snippet.title: Fire Gameplay - Nintendo Game & Watch
snippet.description:
The player controls a pair of firemen holding a trampoline-like bouncer. People are escaping from a burning building, and it's up to the firemen to "bounce" them to an ambulance. The game slowly gets harder as more and more people escape, and the game ends when 3 people hit the ground and don't make it to the ambulance. 

Game B is essentially the same as Game A but faster. Simple but addictive game. I wonder what happen to the victims when the ambulance just stay there. :) 

If you need a stand to display your game, take a look of the stands I use http://www.addingoil.com/store
